settings.text:
Spring Season (March - May)

  • March 15-16: Spring Kickoff Race Series
  • April 6-7: Vintage Bike Weekend
  • April 20-21: Youth Championship Series
  • May 4-5: Pro-Am Challenge
  • May 18-19: Memorial Day Classic

Summer Season (June - August)

  • June 8-9: Summer Nationals
  • June 22-23: Family Fun Weekend
  • July 13-14: Independence Day Spectacular
  • July 27-28: Women's Motocross Championship
  • August 10-11: Enduro Cross Challenge
  • August 24-25: Summer Championship Finals

Fall Season (September - November)

  • September 7-8: Fall Classic
  • September 21-22: Vintage Championship
  • October 5-6: Halloween Havoc
  • October 19-20: Season Championship
  • November 2-3: Turkey Trot Enduro

Wednesday Practice: 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM (April - October)

Saturday Practice: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Year-round weather permitting)

Sunday Practice: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM (Year-round weather permitting)

Practice Fees: $25 for members, $35 for non-members

Requirements: Valid AMA membership, proper safety equipment, and signed waiver required.
